headline: JP Morgan Raises Target Price on Citi (C), Keeps Overweight Call
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is one of the 10 Best Bank Stocks to Buy in 2026. On February 9, JPMorgan raised its target price on Citi by 3.1% to $134 (from $130), reiterating its Overweight rating on the stock. This target price change comes as JPMorgan updated its large-cap bank forecasts following the release of the […]

headline: Citigroup CEO Pay Hike Puts Focus On Transformation And Valuation Gap
summary: Citigroup's board approved a substantial compensation increase for CEO Jane Fraser, tied to record revenues, regulatory progress, and an ongoing transformation of the bank. The decision reflects board recognition of Fraser's role in simplifying the business through streamlining, divestitures, and management changes. The pay package is framed around aligning executive incentives with shareholder value for investors in NYSE:C. For investors watching large U.S. banks, Citigroup (NYSE:C) has...

headline: Is There An Opportunity In Citigroup (C) After Recent Restructuring Efforts And Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Citigroup's current share price really reflects its value, you are not alone. Many investors are asking the same question as the stock sits at US$110.86. The shares have seen a mixed patch recently, with a 10.4% decline over the last 7 days and a 6.1% decline over the last 30 days, set against a 34.4% return over 1 year, a very large 3 year return and a 101.6% return over 5 years. Recent headlines around Citigroup have focused on broad restructuring efforts,...
